column1: I love this product! It's amazing.
This movie was terrible, I hated it.
The weather today is neither good nor bad.
I'm feeling great about the upcoming event.
The service at the restaurant was awful.
I can't wait to try the new recipe.
The customer support was very helpful.
The traffic was so frustrating this morning.
I had a fantastic experience at the concert.
The hotel room was not clean and comfortable.
I hate when I have to call and wake people up
I strongly dislike the new policy.
The performance of the team was impressive.
The news was neither positive nor negative.
